sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { addPost } from '../../blog.reducer' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Post } from '../../../types/blog.type' const initialFormType: Post = { title: '', description: '', publishDate: '', id: '', featuredImage: '', published: false } const CreatePost = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState(initialFormType) const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleAddPost = () => { } return (
